text.LicenseAcceptDialog_FirstStartGeneric: This is the first time you are starting Duality. By using it, you are agreeing to its license terms, as linked below.
text.LicenseAcceptDialog_PackageDesc: Installing package {0} requires a license agreement.
text.LicenseAcceptDialog_TranscriptUnavailabl: License text transcript unavailable. Check the License Url link below for the original license text source.
text.MenuItemInfo_ConfigureLauncher: Select which launcher application should be used for external game tests. By default, the Duality Launcher is used.
text.MenuItemInfo_OpenProjectSource: The project source code is where your game logic happens. To help you get started, Duality will create and open a suitable Visual Studio solution for you.
text.MenuItemInfo_ProfileGame: Runs the game in profiling mode without VSync or any other frame rate limiting mechanism.
text.MenuItemInfo_PublishGame: Creates a version of the game ready to distribute to others, with all necessary files
text.MenuItemInfo_RunGame: Want to see how your game looks like in its release version? This will save all project data and run the external Duality launcher.
text.MenuItemInfo_SaveAll: This will save all project data, i.e. all existing Resources. If you take a look at the Project View, you might notice that some Resources are written in italics - these are the ones that have been changed without being saved yet.
text.MenuItemInfo_SerializerUpdateAll: This operation will load and re-save all existing Resources. Due to the serialization progress, all Resources will be guaranteed to use the same file format and to be up-to-date according to core plugin class definitions.
text.MenuItemInfo_ToggleBackups: If active, Duality will backup each file before saving it.
text.Msg_CantExport_Text: Can't export Resource '{0}'. None of the available importers is able to handle this Resource type.
text.Msg_CantImport_Text: Can't import file '{0}'. None of the available importers is able to handle the files format.
text.Msg_ConfirmBreakPrefabLink_Desc: This action will break the objects Prefab Link. Proceed?
text.Msg_ConfirmDeleteSelectedObjects_Text: Do you really want to delete the selected objects?
text.Msg_ConfirmQuit_Desc: Do you really want to quit?
text.Msg_ConfirmQuitUnsaved_Desc: The following Resources have been modified without saving:{0}Do you want to save them before exiting?
text.Msg_ConfirmReloadResource_Text: The currently active Resource '{0}' has been modified externally. Do you want to reload it from file? Any unsaved changes might be lost.
text.Msg_CreateProjectErrorNestedFolder_Desc: The specified target folder is located within the current working directory. Please select one that is located elsewhere.
text.Msg_CreateProjectErrorTargetExists_Desc: The specified target folder already exists and is not empty. Please select a different one.
text.Msg_CreateProjectErrorTargetIsFilePath_D: The specified target folder is conflicting with an existing file. Please select a different one.
text.MsgLicenseNotAgreedAbort_Desc: The install operation was canceled. You can only install this package when agreeing to its license terms.
text.TaskChangeDataFormat_Desc: The project data format has been changed to {0}. Existing Resource files will be converted shortly.
text.TaskFormatUpdateAll_Desc: All existing Resource files are being updated according to the current file format specifications.
text.TaskInstallPackages_Desc: Duality is installing some required packages. This may include downloading them from the central package repository.
text.TaskRenameContentRefs_Desc: One or more Resources have been moved or renamed. Duality is searching for references to these Resources in order to update them.
text.Template_Current_Desc: Creates a new project by cloning the current one.
